delete[select id from JBCXM__GSRelationship__c];
delete[select id from JBCXM__GSRelationshipType__c];
delete[select id from JBCXM__GSRelationshipSection__c];

// Create Relationship 

String RName = 'Test_' + datetime.now().format('MM_dd_yyyy_HH_mm_ss_a','Asia/Kolkata');
JBCXM__GSRelationshipType__c  RelType = new JBCXM__GSRelationshipType__c ();
RelType.JBCXM__Active__c = true;
RelType.JBCXM__Attributes__c = RelType.Name = RName;

insert RelType;
system.debug(RName);

JBCXM__GSRelationshipType__c Rid = [select id from JBCXM__GSRelationshipType__c where name = :RName];
system.debug(Rid.id);

Section5.JBCXM__Config__c ='[]';
Section5.JBCXM__DisplayOrder__c=5;
Section5.JBCXM__Label__c='Cockpit';
Section5.JBCXM__RelationshipType__c=Rid.id;
Section5.JBCXM__Type__c='section';
Section5.Name='Cockpit';

insert Section5;


//Relationship Creation
List<JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c> accList = [SELECT JBCXM__Account__c, JBCXM__Account__r.Data_ExternalId__c FROM JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c where JBCXM__Account__r.Data_ExternalId__c like 'Sreejith%' ];
JBCXM__GSRelationshipType__c relationType = [select id from JBCXM__GSRelationshipType__c];
List <JBCXM__GSRelationship__c> Relationship = new List <JBCXM__GSRelationship__c>();
integer i =0;
for(JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c acc: accList){
		JBCXM__GSRelationship__c relation = new JBCXM__GSRelationship__c (
		JBCXM__Account__c = acc.JBCXM__Account__c,
		JBCXM__RelationshipType__c = relationType.id,
		Name = 'Testing'+i
	);
	i++;
	Relationship.add(relation);
}
insert Relationship;
